pageContext.description: 2 big dents in blade. Socket is hollow to A. Edges fairly sharp.
pageContext.patina: Greyish brown on reverse, rust stains. On face, thin dark brown matt.
pageContext.surface: Good. Golden bronze just shows at edge.
pageContext.associations: Hoard SW of Wrekin. Part of sword + 5 spearheads (part of the hoard)
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1926,6,Lord Forester,Willey Park, Broseley, Salop.
